mapper.select: select e.emp_id as emp_id , e.emp_nm as emp_nm , d.dept_nm as dept_nm , p.pos_nm as pos_nm from emp e inner join dept d on e.dept_id = d.dept_id inner join pos p on e.pos_id = p.pos_id where e.emp_id not in ('master', #{emp_id}) order by d.dept_sort, e.pos_id, e.emp_id
mapper.insert: insert into msg_list (msg_id, emp_id, input_text, input_date) values (#{msg_id}, #{emp_id}, #{input_text}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select c.msg_id as msg_id , c.emp_id as emp_id , e.emp_nm as emp_nm , c.input_text as input_text , input_date from msg_list c inner join emp e on c.emp_id = e.emp_id and c.msg_id = #{msg_id} order by input_date
